Name: Perimeter
About the game: Perimeter is an innovative Real-Time-Strategy game that pits players against each other or AI opponents in a life and death struggle to seize territory and establish critical protective “perimeters.” Players will be introduced to the game’s unique “terraforming” feature, allowing them to move, build, construct and destroy the map environment. Set in a future where the Exodus civilization has abandoned the dying Earth, the game offers a well-balanced combination of new terraforming principles and territorial wars with traditional strategy elements. Key features: Fast paced Real-Time-Strategy action Introduces principles of terraforming in which players can construct or destroy the very gameworld environments themselves State-of-the-art engine and graphics that deliver powerful gameplay and solid audio and visuals Detailed science fiction universe with original soundtrack, including high quality electronic music Perimeter is affected by the GameSpy shutdown on the 31st of May. You can continue to play the game through LAN, DirectIP and GameRanger.
